src:
Novi prenosnik Apple MacBook Pro z grafiko AMD?

05 Nov 2019, 08:56

Procesorji AMD so med uporabniki osebnih računalnikov iz dneva v dan bolj priljubljeni, predvsem na račun naprednih in zmogljivih procesorjev družine Ryzen. V zadnjem času pa vse bolj na priljubljenosti pridobivajo tudi njegove grafične kartice, ki temeljijo na osnovi grafičnega jedra Navi. Zato ne presenečajo govorice, da naj bi bil novi prenosni računalnik Apple MacBook Pro opremljen z zmogljivo grafično kartico podjetja AMD.
Novi prenosnik Apple MacBook Pro naj bi bil glede na spletne govorice opremljen s kar 40,6-centimetrskim oziroma 16-palčnim zaslonom visoke ločljivosti. Za brezhibno prikazovanje slik pa naj bi skrbela grafična kartica AMD Radeon RX 5300M ali Radeon RX 5500 MX. V to je prepričana skupina računalniških zanesenjakov, ki naj bi v programski kodi operacijskega sistema macOS 10.15.1 našla del kode, ki omenja »Radeon RX 5500 / 5500M«.
Pri tem velja omeniti, da tu gre šele za spletne govorice, kar pomeni, da ni nujno, da bo tovrstni prenosni računalnik podjetja Apple dejansko ugledal luč sveta. Verjamemo pa, da bi bili nad njim navdušeni številni uporabniki računalniških sistemom podjetja Apple. Grafične kartice AMD so se namreč v praksi izkazale za odlično alternativo rešitvam podjetja Nvidia.



Povezave: Apple
text:
New Apple MacBook Pro Notebook with AMD Graphics?

05 Nov 2019, 08:56

AMD processors are becoming more and more popular among PC users, especially at the expense of the advanced and powerful Ryzen processors. Recently, its graphics cards, which are based on the Navi graphics core, are gaining in popularity. It is no surprise, then, that the new Apple MacBook Pro is expected to come with a powerful graphics card from AMD.
According to online rumors, the new Apple MacBook Pro is expected to come with a 40.6-inch or 16-inch high-definition display. The AMD Radeon RX 5300M or Radeon RX 5500 MX graphics card should be able to display the images smoothly. This is believed by a group of computer enthusiasts who, in the macOS 10.15.1 software code, is expected to find a piece of code that mentions "Radeon RX 5500 / 5500M".
It should be noted that this is just a matter of online rumors, which means that it is not necessary that Apple's laptop will actually see the light of the world. However, we believe that many users would be impressed by Apple's computer systems. In fact, AMD graphics cards have proven to be a great alternative to Nvidia's solutions.



Links: Apple
